      • printFrame

        public static void printFrame​(int frame,
                              int color,
                              int gridNum)
        Print one frame with the indicated size, color and position
        Parameters:
        frame - size of frame [0 .. FRAME_DIM-1]
        color - color of frame [0 .. MAX_COLORS-1]
        gridNum - position of frame [1 .. BOARD_DIM*BOARD_DIM-1] or 0 (piece position)

      • clearFrame

        Parameters:
        frame - size of frame [0 .. FRAME_DIM-1]
        gridNum - position of frame [1 .. BOARD_DIM*BOARD_DIM-1] or 0 (piece position)
